title: Fūki Jigokuhen - Itadaki
description:
Description :
        In an all-boys boarding school closed off by the sea, a man named Akira Kujo stands up to correct public morals, but due to a misplaced curse, he is turned into a woman. The only condition to turn back into a man again is to keep his purity for one month.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 1: The Kitty From Public Morals
